ygData.subject: Re: New Destron
ygData.msgSnippet: Guiledart smiled. Yes we are going to the other destron base first then we attack. I will have to stay behind...to make sure our own plan doesnt work against

 Guiledart smiled. "Yes we are going to the other
destron base first then we attack. I will have to stay
behind...to make sure our own plan doesnt work against
us. You however will go." He entered the bridge and
nodded to Cygar. "You remember our old friend
Halucinagen. He will be going with you to battle. Also
I will stay behind and protect the base. Have you
gotten hold of Drill bit?"
--- gunthers8@... wrote:
> ::Halucigen::
> Halucigen smiled and followed Guiledart. He was now
> more ruthless then
> ever and couldn't wait to get into battle.
> "So are we attacking anyone soon."
>

> wrote:
> >  Guiledart smiled. "Alright lets go to the
> bridge." He
> > started to walk away.

> > > > banged up on our trip back to earth but your
> fine
> > > > now."

> that
> > > it
> > > > > was pointless.

> about

> > > > > down.

> > > > > > and must put him unconsious. "Now we can

> > > > > you
